pinyin: Shi2 you2 Shu1 chu1 guo2 Zu3 zhi1

definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: In recent years, Non-OPEC oil production has continued to rise.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，非石油輸出國組織的石油產量持續上升。

sentences.english: Opec agreed yesterday to raise output by two million barrels a day.
sentences.chinese: 石油輸出國組織昨日同意每天原油產量二百萬桶。

definition: OPEC/Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries
special drawing rights (SDR), international currency of the IMF

pinyin: ju1 min2 xiao1 fei4 jia4 ge2 zhi3 shu4

definition: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, OECD/abbr. for 經濟合作與發展組織|经济合作与发展组织
